{{also|Anrufen}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{m|de|rufen||to shout}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[ˈʔanʁuːfɱ̩]|[ˈʔanʁuːfən]}} * {{audio|de|De-at-anrufen.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-anrufen.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=7|ruft an|rief an|angerufen|past subjunctive=riefe an}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[call]] by telephone; to [[ring]] (someone) # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[call on]] (someone, e.g. a divine being); to [[appeal]] to; to [[call upon]] ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-strong|ruf|rief|gerufen|h||||a||an}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Anrufen}} * {{l|de|Anrufer}} * {{l|de|anrufend}} * {{l|de|angerufen}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Anruf}} ===See also=== * {{l|de|telefonieren}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
